summary: Young couple decide to live together and they wind up having a baby. They decide they should give the baby up for adoption. The baby's Mother's parents wind up adopting the baby using a fake name.
cast: Bob Hope|Jackie Gleason|Jane Wyman|Leslie Nielsen|Maureen Arthur|Tina Louise|Tim Matheson|Paul Stewart|Irwin Corey|JoAnna Cameron|The Comfortable Chair|David Burns|Glenn Corbett|Victoria Shaw|Danny Borzage|Don Brodie|Rudy Germane|Alex Gerry|Lauren Gilbert|Robert Hitchcock|Kenner G. Kemp|Jack Pepper|Murray Pollack|Tony Regan|Anne Seymour|Arthur Tovey
title: How to Commit Marriage
